attributes.action: Keep British Summer Time (BST) all year round
attributes.additional_details:
Petition to keep BST all year round.

There will be more usable daylight hours in the evening, better driving conditions when more people are commuting at tea-time, less power used so more enviromentally friendly, safer for children to play out for longer in the winter.

I want the government to scrap the Autumn clock change, and keep British Summer Time.
